name: RoomEscape:LostCity
description: This is a puzzle decryption game. At the end of the world, as a survivor, you are trapped in a house during the search for supplies. Before the supplies are exhausted, you need to find clues and escape. . Explore the world, continue the fire of civilization, and find the truth of the world's lost. Open your brain hole, diverge your thinking, solve these puzzles, come and challenge!
